Vacancies.Name: Waitress
Vacancies.JobDescription:
- 8 saatlıq iş rejimi 
  - Dəyişən iş qrafiki
  - İş saatında yemək verilir
  - Istirahet gunu heftede 1 defe
Vacancies.Requirements:
- Gülərüzlü olmaq
  - Şirkətin daxili qaydalarına riayət etmək
  - Qonaqlara yüksək səviyyləli xidmət göstərmək
  - Ən azından sifariş qəbul edəcək və xidmət göstərəcək səviyyədə ingilis dili biliyi

Vacancies.Name: Site administrator
Vacancies.JobDescription:
- Management of the company's site/sites
  - Entering and updating information on the company's site/sites
  - To monitor the technical support and proper functioning of the existing site
  - Improvement of the existing site
  - Troubleshooting software errors
  - Performing other IT tasks
Vacancies.Requirements:
- Technical higher education (education in the field of IT is desirable)
  - Must know JAVA PHP, Html5, WordPress, SSL, Figma, Cpanel
  - SQL knowledge
  - Web programming and session management
  - Understand processes and methodologies in existing software
  - Ability to analyze and work with pre-written codes

Vacancies.Name: IT Engineer
Vacancies.JobDescription:
- Management of the company's site/sites
  - Entering and updating information on the company's site/sites
  - To monitor the technical support and proper functioning of the existing site
  - Improvement of the existing site
  - Troubleshooting software errors

Vacancies.Requirements:
- High education
  - At least 1 year of work experience in the field of information technologies
  - The ability to apply innovations in one's work
  - Having appropriate knowledge of foreign languages
  - Responsible approach to work, ability to communicate

Vacancies.Name: Operator
Vacancies.JobDescription:
- Communication with drivers by phone and social networks
  - Processing complaints and requests and feedback to drivers
  - Respond to all incoming calls in a timely and efficient manner
  - Accurate and correct transmission of information related to the service and provision of technical support
  - Timely and accurate performance of tasks given by management
Vacancies.Requirements:
- Should be fluent in Azerbaijani language
  - Ability to speak fluently and with clear intonation
  - Ability to communicate and listen on the phone
  - Ability to clearly express your opinion and presentatio
  - Fulfilling duties on time
  - Business and goal-oriented, ability to work in a team
  - Keeping data confidential in the work process
  - Neat, punctual, good looking
  - Knowledge of office programs: Word, Excel
  - Work experience in this field is a must

Vacancies.Name: Videographer-Photographer
Vacancies.JobDescription:
- Working schedule 
  - weekdays from 10:00 to 18:00
  - Making commercials, promo videos
  - Making long and short videos for social networks
  - Ability to work with a team
  - To put forward proposals and initiatives in order to increase the efficiency of the agency's work in the creative field
  - Software knowledge for video editing: Adobe Premiere, After Effects
Vacancies.Requirements:
- Gender: Male
  - Knowing graphic programs
  - Motion animation (preferred)
  - Knowledge of Premiere, Photoshop, After Effects
  - At least 1 year of work experience in the relevant field
  - Creative and innovative thinking
  - Ability to work in a team

Vacancies.Name: Seller
Vacancies.JobDescription:
- Saleswomen are required for Dalga market, located near Metro Insaatchilar
  - Work experience is a must
  - Working hours 9 hours, once a week off spring from the store
  - Salary between 350-400
  - Contact for more details
Vacancies.Requirements: - Must have experience in a grocery store

Vacancies.Name: Taxi Driver
Vacancies.JobDescription:
- Our drivers will be given a Toyota Prius car
  - Those who want to join with their own car can also write. We offer them cooperation on favorable terms
  - The income varies between 20-40 manats per day depending on the driver's job
  - In addition, there are weekly and monthly bonuses and gifts
  - The driver is provided with a company number
Vacancies.Requirements:
- Male candidate
  - 25-50 years old
  - BC category driver's license
  - At least 2-3 years of experience as a driver (taxi drivers are preferred)
  - Getting to know the city of Baku normally
  - Responsible, accurate, diligent, eager to win

Vacancies.Name: Front-end Programmer
Vacancies.JobDescription:
- Working hours: 5 days a week, from 09:00 to 18:00
  - Workplace: 56 Ahmet Rajabli, Aynali Plaza, 6th floor
  - The salary will be determined according to the knowledge and skills of the candidate
  - Applications are accepted in the form of a CV.
Vacancies.Requirements:
- HTML, CSS
  - Javascript
  - React.js
  - Redux, Redux-toolkit
  - Axios, Rest API, WebSocket
  - Ssss, less

Vacancies.Name: Registrar

Vacancies.Requirements:

  - Age 18-50

  - Handwriting skills are a must
  - Written and oral communication skills in Azerbaijani are a must
  - Punctual
  - Responsible
  - Able to adapt to the collective

Vacancies.Name: IT Engineer
Vacancies.JobDescription:
- Konsis company is recruiting an IT specialist with knowledge and experience in this field
  - Office work
  - IT specialist 
  - A technical support representative who handles inquiries from product users or other support engineers. Depending on the type of application, this specialist resolves the issue himself or forwards it to colleagues for review
  - Excellent opportunities for professional development and self-realization
Vacancies.Requirements:
- Ability to investigate and analyze system-wide problems
  - Knowledge of network and Windows operating system
  - Solving problems on the spot
  - Prepare technical documentation and report to management
  - Knowledge of Azerbaijani and Russian languages
